= protobuf =
* build on windows
    * open Developer Command Prompt for VS2015
    * cd %USERPROFILE%\code\protobuf-3.2.0\cmake
    * mkdir build\debug
    * cd build\debug
    * cmake -G "NMake Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -Dprotobuf_BUILD_TESTS=OFF -Dprotobuf_MSVC_STATIC_RUNTIME=OFF ../..
    * nmake
    * copy libprotobufd.lib libprotobuf.lib
    * setx PROTOBUF_ROOT %USERPROFILE%\code\protobuf-3.2.0
    * setx CMAKE_INCLUDE_PATH %USERPROFILE%\code\protobuf-3.2.0\src
    * setx CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH %USERPROFILE%\code\protobuf-3.2.0\cmake\build\debug
* build on macos
    * cd ~/code/protobuf-3.2.0/cmake
    * mkdir build
    * cd build
    * cmake -Dprotobuf_BUILD_TESTS=OFF ..
    * make
    * make install
* build on linux
    * sudo yum install -y autoconf automake libtool curl make g++ unzip
    * cd ~/code/protobuf-3.2.0
    * ./autogen.sh
    * ./configure
    * make
    * make check
    * sudo make install
    * sudo ldconfig

= openssl =
* build on windows
    * install nasm http://www.nasm.us
    * install perl http://strawberryperl.com
    * open Developer Command Prompt for VS2015
    * cd %USERPROFILE%\code\openssl-1.1.0e
    * perl Configure VC-WIN32
    * nmake
    * nmake test
    * setx OPENSSL_ROOT %USERPROFILE%\code\openssl-1.1.0e
* build on macos & linux
    * cd ~/code/openssl-1.1.0e
    * ./config
    * make
    * sudo make install
* fix linux issue
    * sudo ln -s /usr/local/lib64/libssl.so.1.1 /usr/lib64/libssl.so.1.1
    * sudo ln -s /usr/local/lib64/libcrypto.so.1.1 /usr/lib64/libcrypto.so.1.1
* generating ec keys
    * openssl ecparam -list_curves
    * openssl ecparam -name prime256v1 -param_enc named_curve -genkey -noout -out pri.pem
    * openssl ec -in pri.pem -pubout -out pub.pem
